definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Our evident fence around the residence is our confidence of correspondent defence.
sentences.chinese: 我们住宅四周围表面化的栅子是我们相应防卫的信心。

sentences.english: The fence marks the boundary between my land and hers.
sentences.chinese: 这道栅子是我的地和她的地的分界线。

definition: earth embankment used to hold back or retain water/dike around a paddy field

sections of a city close to the city wall
